mapper.insert: insert into persons (username, name, surname, email, password, url_photo, role, active, tx_user_id, tx_host, tx_date) values (#{username}, #{name}, #{surname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{urlPhoto}, #{role}, #{active}, #{txUserId}, #{txHost}, #{txDate});
mapper.select: SELECT id_user as idUser, username as username, name as name, surname as surname, email as email, password as password, url_photo as urlPhoto, role as role, active as active, tx_user_id as txUserId, tx_host as txHost, tx_date as txDate FROM persons WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1;
